1101110100110001 0101101101101010 0 -> sum: 0011100010011011, cout: 1

1000110100101001 1101010100010110 0 -> sum: 0110001000111111, cout: 1
1000100111111111 1101011011100100 1 -> sum: 0110000011100100, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
